title: Plastic
data:
**Plastic** is a [material](/wiki/Material "Material") for objects that occurs in *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*.

Plastic is a non-[organic](/wiki/Organic "Organic") [flimsy](/wiki/Flimsy "Flimsy") material that is flammable and vulnerable to being [burnt](/wiki/Burnt "Burnt").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 List of plastic items](#List_of_plastic_items)

- [2 Variants](#Variants)

  - [2.1 NetHack: The Next Generation](#NetHack:_The_Next_Generation)
  - [2.2 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [2.3 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [2.4 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)
  - [2.5 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [3 References](#References)

## List of plastic items

The following items are made of plastic:

- [ice box](/wiki/Ice_box "Ice box")
- [credit card](/wiki/Credit_card "Credit card")
- [expensive camera](/wiki/Expensive_camera "Expensive camera")
- [magic marker](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker")
- [rubber hose](/wiki/Rubber_hose "Rubber hose")
- [cheap plastic imitation of the Amulet of Yendor](/wiki/Cheap_plastic_imitation_of_the_Amulet_of_Yendor "Cheap plastic imitation of the Amulet of Yendor")

[Polypiling](/wiki/Polypiling "Polypiling") enough plastic objects may result in the creation of a [straw golem](/wiki/Straw_golem "Straw golem").[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

## Variants

### NetHack: The Next Generation

In [NetHack: The Next Generation](/wiki/NetHack:_The_Next_Generation "NetHack: The Next Generation"), the [pack of floppies](/wiki/Pack_of_floppies "Pack of floppies") is made of plastic.

### SLASH'EM

[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") adds the [fly swatter](/wiki/Fly_swatter "Fly swatter"), [stick of dynamite](/wiki/Stick_of_dynamite "Stick of dynamite") and [green lightsaber](/wiki/Green_lightsaber "Green lightsaber") as items that are made of plastic. [Wands](/wiki/Wand "Wand") that have the [randomized appearance](/wiki/Randomized_appearance "Randomized appearance") of a "black wand" are made of plastic.

[Polypiling](/wiki/Polypiling "Polypiling") enough plastic objects may create a [plastic golem](/wiki/Plastic_golem "Plastic golem").

### EvilHack

[EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") adds the [eight ball](/wiki/Eight_ball "Eight ball") and [goggles](/wiki/Goggles "Goggles") as objects that have a base material of plastic. Its [object materials system](/wiki/Object_materials_\(EvilHack\) "Object materials (EvilHack)") allows several other objects to be made of plastic, though none of those objects will normally generate with this material.

### SlashTHEM

In addition to SLASH'EM details, [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") also incorporates [plasteel armor](/wiki/Plasteel_armor "Plasteel armor") from the [Jedi](/wiki/Jedi "Jedi") patch into the base game, which is all made of plastic.

SlashTHEM also adds the [pair of rubber gloves](/index.php?title=Pair_of_rubber_gloves\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Pair of rubber gloves (page does not exist)"), pack of floppies and [photograph](/index.php?title=Photograph\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Photograph (page does not exist)") as items that are made of plastic, and adds the following randomized appearances that are made of plastic:

- [Rings](/wiki/Ring "Ring")

  - plastic ring
  - cameo ring
  - intaglio ring
  - dazzling ring
  - deep ring
  - lighting ring
  - bright ring
  - pretty ring

- Wands
  - plastic wand

### Hack'EM

In addition to SLASH'EM details, [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM") also incorporates [plasteel armor](/wiki/Plasteel_armor "Plasteel armor") from the [Jedi](/wiki/Jedi "Jedi") patch into the base game, and adds the eight ball and goggles from EvilHack. Its [object materials system](/index.php?title=Object_materials_\(Hack%27EM\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Object materials (Hack'EM) (page does not exist)") allows several other objects to be made of plastic.

Hack'EM also adds the following randomized appearances that are made of plastic:

- Rings

  - neon ring
  - tapered ring

- Wands

  - plastic wand
  - green wand
  - pliable wand

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/zap.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1343](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/zap.c#L1343): *straw golems act as fall-through for materials that are not listed in specific cases*

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.")
html:
Plastic

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Plastic is a material for objects that occurs in NetHack.

Plastic is a non-organic flimsy material that is flammable and vulnerable to being burnt.

Contents

  • 1 List of plastic items
  • 2 Variants
    • 2.1 NetHack: The Next Generation
    • 2.2 SLASH'EM
    • 2.3 EvilHack
    • 2.4 SlashTHEM
    • 2.5 Hack'EM
  • 3 References

List of plastic items

The following items are made of plastic:

  • ice box
  • credit card
  • expensive camera
  • magic marker
  • rubber hose
  • cheap plastic imitation of the Amulet of Yendor

Polypiling enough plastic objects may result in the creation of a straw golem.[1]

Variants

NetHack: The Next Generation

In NetHack: The Next Generation, the pack of floppies is made of plastic.

SLASH'EM

SLASH'EM adds the fly swatter, stick of dynamite and green lightsaber as items that are made of plastic. Wands that have the randomized appearance of a "black wand" are made of plastic.

Polypiling enough plastic objects may create a plastic golem.

EvilHack

EvilHack adds the eight ball and goggles as objects that have a base material of plastic. Its object materials system allows several other objects to be made of plastic, though none of those objects will normally generate with this material.

SlashTHEM

In addition to SLASH'EM details, SlashTHEM also incorporates plasteel armor from the Jedi patch into the base game, which is all made of plastic.

SlashTHEM also adds the pair of rubber gloves, pack of floppies and photograph as items that are made of plastic, and adds the following randomized appearances that are made of plastic:

  • Rings
    • plastic ring
    • cameo ring
    • intaglio ring
    • dazzling ring
    • deep ring
    • lighting ring
    • bright ring
    • pretty ring
  • Wands
    • plastic wand

Hack'EM

In addition to SLASH'EM details, Hack'EM also incorporates plasteel armor from the Jedi patch into the base game, and adds the eight ball and goggles from EvilHack. Its object materials system allows several other objects to be made of plastic.

Hack'EM also adds the following randomized appearances that are made of plastic:

  • Rings
    • neon ring
    • tapered ring
  • Wands
    • plastic wand
    • green wand
    • pliable wand

References

  1. ↑ src/zap.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1343: straw golems act as fall-through for materials that are not listed in specific cases

'''Plastic''' is a [[material]] for objects that occurs in ''[[NetHack]]''.

Plastic is a non-[[organic]] [[flimsy]] material that is flammable and vulnerable to being [[burnt]].

==List of plastic items==
The following items are made of plastic:

* [[ice box]]
* [[credit card]]
* [[expensive camera]]
* [[magic marker]]
* [[rubber hose]]
* [[cheap plastic imitation of the Amulet of Yendor]]

[[Polypiling]] enough plastic objects may result in the creation of a [[straw golem]].{{refsrc|src/zap.c|1343|version=NetHack 3.6.7|comment=straw golems act as fall-through for materials that are not listed in specific cases}}

==Variants==
===NetHack: The Next Generation===
In [[NetHack: The Next Generation]], the [[pack of floppies]] is made of plastic.

===SLASH'EM===
[[SLASH'EM]] adds the [[fly swatter]], [[stick of dynamite]] and [[green lightsaber]] as items that are made of plastic. [[Wand]]s that have the [[randomized appearance]] of a "black wand" are made of plastic.

[[Polypiling]] enough plastic objects may create a [[plastic golem]].

===EvilHack===
[[EvilHack]] adds the [[eight ball]] and [[goggles]] as objects that have a base material of plastic. Its [[Object materials (EvilHack)|object materials system]] allows several other objects to be made of plastic, though none of those objects will normally generate with this material.

===SlashTHEM===
In addition to SLASH'EM details, [[SlashTHEM]] also incorporates [[plasteel armor]] from the [[Jedi]] patch into the base game, which is all made of plastic.

SlashTHEM also adds the [[pair of rubber gloves]], pack of floppies and [[photograph]] as items that are made of plastic, and adds the following randomized appearances that are made of plastic:

* [[Ring]]s
** plastic ring
** cameo ring
** intaglio ring
** dazzling ring
** deep ring
** lighting ring
** bright ring
** pretty ring
* Wands
** plastic wand

===Hack'EM===
In addition to SLASH'EM details, [[Hack'EM]] also incorporates [[plasteel armor]] from the [[Jedi]] patch into the base game, and adds the eight ball and goggles from EvilHack. Its [[Object materials (Hack'EM)|object materials system]] allows several other objects to be made of plastic.

Hack'EM also adds the following randomized appearances that are made of plastic:

* Rings
** neon ring
** tapered ring
* Wands
** plastic wand
** green wand
** pliable wand
